name: Ball and Paddle
description:
This is my entry for the Flyover Indies Learning Jam 1. I want to learn Godot and thought it would be a good opportunity! 

The game is incredibly basic, a simple pong clone with an increasingly difficult AI opponent, first to 3 points wins!

Controls : W/S or Up/ Down

Hot tip: Hitting the ball while moving your paddle will put a bit of English on it.

Enjoy!
